name: microcap gem
description: microcap gem is a community-driven experiment at the crossroads of culture, memes and crypto. the project is designed to showcase how something small, or “micro,” can evolve into larger movements, using $MCG as both a token and a communal identity. By combining narrative, community participation, and creative expression microcap gem highlights how conviction and belief can transform micro-scale projects into meaningful on-chain identities with long-term value.
